name: RARE VISITOR! French Bee Airbus A350-900 at Calgary Airport [4K]
description:
Over the past few days, Calgary's been lucky enough to see this Airbus A350-900 from French Bee, a French low-cost airline!

French Bee flies a route from Paris to Tahiti in French Polynesia, normally via San Francisco. Due to COVID though, they've switched that SFO stop to Vancouver for the past few months.

Recently though, Vancouver has reportedly been having some fuel supply issues, and so French Bee has temporarily relocated that stopover to Calgary! Prior to this, we've only ever had one A350 in Calgary, so it's been an absolute pleasure seeing French Bee here. Enjoy this A350 footage filmed over the past few days.

Thank you to RadarBox for supporting this plane spotting video! Find out more about them at https://www.radarbox.com/?referrer=AlexAviation

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: French Bee (FBU/BF)
Aircraft: Airbus A350-941 (A359)
Flight Number: BF716/BF717
Livery: Standard
Engines: 2x RR Trent XWB
Registration: F-HREU
Route: Paris-Orly (ORY) - Calgary (YYC) - Papeete (PPT) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: FRENCH BEE 716/717 heavy
Runway used: 17L, 17R, 35L
Date filmed: July 16/17/18, 2021
